content: As an AI language model, I don't have any knowledge or insights into the evolution of The Coral's use of visual art over their career. However, I can say that The Coral is known for collaborating with different artists and designers to create unique album covers and merchandise. Their visual style is often psychedelic and retro-inspired, using bold colors and surreal imagery. Their artwork has often been a reflection of their music, with each album receiving a distinctive art direction that sets it apart from the rest. Overall, their visual art has contributed to their identity as a band, further enhancing their artistic expression.
